attributes.action: Stop Cornwalls  Western Greyhound rural bus cuts
attributes.additional_details: The Government wants to stop rural bus routes run by Western Greyhound. What about students that need the bus to attend college or people that have jobs in in and around the towns? What about the elderly that have no family to help them get to the supermarkets or important appointments? The bus is a lot of peoples only means of transport. Please sign against the cuts
